High Priest Orven:

Local people want to perform the rite of remembrance of dead warriors who faced their death in the Plains of the Lizardmen.

But they can't do it now, too many monsters are wandering in that place.

Go to the Plains of the Lizardmen and kill monsters roaming there. Monsters to hunt: Tanta Lizardman, Tanta Lizardman Warrior, Tanta Lizardman Berserker, Tanta Lizardman Archer, Tanta Lizardman Summoner. You have to destroy 1000 monsters.
